item.title: [help]~ Yell command
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

[quote=“runefreak10, post:19, topic:274759”][quote author=noobspure50 link=topic=363000.msg2758838#msg2758838 date=1240385228]

if (command.startsWith("modyell") && playerRights > 1) { String text = command.substring(7); yell("["mod"] " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } Oh you are right >.> whatev

if (command.startsWith("adminyell") && playerRights > 2) { String text = command.substring(10); yell("["admin"] " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

if (command.startsWith("owneryell") && playerRights > 3) { String text = command.substring(10); yell("["Owner"] " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }
[/quote]

No. That’s completely unneeded. Plus you’re saying admins can only use modyell and owner right can only use admin yell etc. He needs to stick with the switch statement.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: [help]~ Yell command
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Use a switch statement for player rights.

[code]if(command.startsWith(“yell”)) {
String text = command.substring(5);

switch (playerRights) {
case 0:
yell("["+playerName+"]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
break;

case 1:
yell("[Mod] ["+playerName+"]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
break;

case 2:
yell("[Admin] ["+playerName+"]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
break;

case 3:
yell("[Owner] ["+playerName+"]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
break;
}
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [help]~ Yell command
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && playerRights > 0) {
String text = command.substring(5);
yell("["+playerName+"] " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}

if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && playerRights > == 1) {
String text = command.substring(5);
yell("[Mod] ["+playerName+"] " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}

if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && playerRights == 2) {
String text = command.substring(5);
yell("[Admin] ["+playerName+"] " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}

if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && playerRights == 3) {
String text = command.substring(5);
yell("[Owner] ["+playerName+"] " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}
[/code]

Read full topic
